#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin>>n;

        int wins[n];
        int ties[n];
        int score[n];

        for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
            cin>>wins[i];
        for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
            cin>>ties[i];

        for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
            score[i] = 3*wins[i]+ties[i];

        int maxScore = *max_element(score,score+n);
        cout<<maxScore<<endl;
    }
}
